runtime.dlbs_cache.desc: DLBS host cache folder. Will need to be moved to base.json.

openvino.launcher.desc: Path to script that launches OpenVINO benchmarks.

openvino.python_path.desc: Path to a OpenVINO benchmarks python folder. Depends on if bare metal/docker based benchmark is requested.

openvino.env.desc: Environmental variables to set for OpenVINO benchmarks.

openvino.docker_image.desc: The name of a docker image to use for OpenVINO if containerized benchmark is requested.

openvino.data_dir.desc: A data directory if real data should be used. If empty, synthetic data is used (no data ingestion pipeline).

openvino.api.desc: Enable Sync/Async API. Default value is 'async'.
